citation.article-title: Reclassification of the genus Leuconostoc and proposals of Fructobacillus fructosus gen. nov., comb. nov., Fructobacillus durionis comb. nov., Fructobacillus ficulneus comb. nov. and Fructobacillus pseudoficulneus comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Fructobacillus fructosus comb. nov.
Fructobacillus fructosus (fruc.toâ€²sus. N.L. masc. adj. fructosus pertaining to fructose).
Other synonym: Leuconostoc fructosum (Kodama 1956) Antunes et al. 2002.
The description of Fructobacillus fructosus is the same as that given for Leuconostoc fructosum by Antunes et al. (2002).
